-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Quenya verb conjugator
--   
@package quenya-verb
@version 0.0.1

module Quenya.Web

-- | Runs <a>application</a> as a Warp app
main :: IO ()

-- | Converts the Scotty app to a Warp app, for ease of deployment
application :: Bool -> IO Application

-- | Takes the raw body of a request and returns a JSONable response
respond :: ByteString -> Map String String

-- | The "raw" (i.e. without ADTs) verb data type. Only use for interacting
--   with the user.
data StringVerb
StringVerb :: String -> String -> String -> String -> StringVerb
stem :: StringVerb -> String
tense :: StringVerb -> String
subject :: StringVerb -> String
object :: StringVerb -> String

-- | Arbitrary default verb, meaning "I love you"
defaultStringVerb :: StringVerb

-- | Converts a <a>StringVerb</a> to a <a>Verb</a> using the functions in
--   <a>Conversion</a>
toVerb :: StringVerb -> Verb
instance Show StringVerb
instance Generic StringVerb
instance Datatype D1StringVerb
instance Constructor C1_0StringVerb
instance Selector S1_0_0StringVerb
instance Selector S1_0_1StringVerb
instance Selector S1_0_2StringVerb
instance Selector S1_0_3StringVerb
instance FromJSON StringVerb
